039.title: 2019-05-23: Free Mini-workshop: Behavioral Analysis with BORIS
039.summary:
Aula 4, Dept. Life Sciences and Systems Biology, Via Accademia Albertina 13, 10123 Torino, Italy. h. 10:00 - 13:00 and 14:00 - 17:00 - 25 places available (bring your own laptop with the last version of BORIS).

Aula 4, Dept. Life Sciences and Systems Biology, Via Accademia Albertina 13, 10123 Torino, Italy. h. 10:00 - 13:00 and 14:00 - 17:00 - 25 places available (bring your own laptop with the last version of BORIS).

035.title: DORIS is available!
035.summary: DORIS is an easy-to-use interactive objects detection and tracking software with a graphical user interface. It is free and open-source and available for GNU/Linux, Windows and Mac OS.

002.title: The BORIS future major version
002.summary:
The v. 7 will have 8 media file players.
Every player could be undocked from the main window and reorganized on the desktop

The v. 7 will have 8 media file players.
